mapper.select: select tl.id torrentId, tl.name torrentName, tl.link torrentLink, tl.status_id statusId, tl.error_text errorText, tl.state torrentState, tl.type_id typeId, tac.username userName, tac.hash hash from torrents_list tl, torrents_accounts tac where tl.type_id = tac.type_id and tl.id = #{id}

select tl.id torrentId, tl.name torrentName, tl.link torrentLink, tl.status_id statusId, tl.error_text errorText, tl.state torrentState, tl.type_id typeId, tac.username userName, tac.hash hash from torrents_list tl, torrents_accounts tac where tl.type_id = tac.type_id
mapper.update: update torrents_list set name = #{name}, link = #{link}, status_id = #{status, typeHandler=TorrentStatusEnumTypeHandler}, state = #{state.state}, error_text = #{errorText} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into torrents_list (name, link, status_id, type_id, state) values (#{name}, #{link}, #{status, typeHandler=TorrentStatusEnumTypeHandler}, #{type, typeHandler=TorrentTypeEnumTypeHandler}, #{state.state})
